get.description: Search Pokemon species and forms with filtering by IDs, slugs, types, abilities, moves, and more.

get.summary: Get Pokemon form by ID or slug
get.description: Get a single Pokemon form with its parent species by form ID or slug.

get.summary: Get Pokemon by ID or slug
get.description: Get a single Pokemon species with all its forms by species ID or slug.
Search abilities with filtering by IDs, slugs, and flags.

get.summary: Get Ability by ID or slug
get.description: Get a single ability by ID or slug.
Search moves with filtering by IDs, slugs, types, categories, targets, and flags.

get.summary: Get Move by ID or slug
get.description: Get a single move by ID or slug.
Search items with filtering by IDs and tags.

get.summary: Get Item by ID or slug
get.description: Get a single item by ID or slug.
Search articles with filtering by IDs, slugs, categories, and author.

get.summary: Get Article by ID or slug
get.description: Get a single article by ID or slug.

parameters.description: Fuzzy match Pokemon or form names (e.g., "pikachu", "mega charizard")
parameters.name: names

parameters.description: Filter by type names (e.g., "fire", "water"). Returns Pokemon with any matching type
parameters.name: types

parameters.description: Filter by ability names (e.g., "levitate"). Returns Pokemon with any matching ability
parameters.name: abilities

parameters.description: Filter by learnable move names (e.g., "thunderbolt"). Returns Pokemon that can learn any matching move
parameters.name: moves

parameters.description: Filter by egg group names (e.g., "dragon", "monster"). Returns Pokemon in any matching egg group
parameters.name: eggGroups

parameters.description: Filter by label names (e.g., "legendary", "starter"). Returns Pokemon with any matching label
parameters.name: labels

parameters.description: Include generation number the Pokemon was introduced in
parameters.name: includeGeneration

parameters.description: Include base stats (HP, Attack, Defense, Sp.Atk, Sp.Def, Speed, Total)
parameters.name: includeStats

parameters.description: Include EV yield when defeated (for training optimization)
parameters.name: includeEvYield

parameters.description: Include abilities with slot info (slot1, slot2, hidden)
parameters.name: includeAbilities

parameters.description: Include learnable moves with learn method and level. Can be large (100+ moves)
parameters.name: includeMoves

parameters.description: Include Cobblemon item drops when defeated (item name, chance, quantity)
parameters.name: includeDrops

parameters.description: Include breeding stats: egg cycles, base friendship, male ratio
parameters.name: includeBreeding

parameters.description: Include egg group names for breeding compatibility
parameters.name: includeEggGroups

parameters.description: Include cosmetic aspects: choosable variants and valid aspect combinations
parameters.name: includeAspects

parameters.description: Include Cobblemon hitbox dimensions (width, height, fixed)
parameters.name: includeHitboxes

parameters.description: Include Cobblemon lighting properties (light level, liquid glow mode)
parameters.name: includeLighting

parameters.description: Include Cobblemon AI behaviour configuration. Can be large
parameters.name: includeBehaviour

parameters.description: Include Cobblemon spawn data (biomes, conditions, rarity). Can be large for Pokemon with many spawn entries
parameters.name: includeSpawns

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
parameters.name: offset

total.description: Base stat total (sum of all stats)

spAtk.description: Special Attack EVs gained when defeated

spDef.description: Special Defense EVs gained when defeated

height.description: Height in decimeters (divide by 10 for meters)

weight.description: Weight in hectograms (divide by 10 for kg)

slot.description: Ability slot name (e.g., slot1, slot2, hidden)

anyOf.description: Level learned at (null if not level-based)

eggCycles.description: Egg cycles to hatch (each cycle = 257 steps)

anyOf.description: Probability of being male (0.0-1.0). Null if genderless

fixed.description: Whether hitbox scales with Pokemon size

weight.description: Spawn weight within bucket (higher = more common)

anyOf.description: Spawn rate multiplier when condition is met
Must be raining (true), not raining (false), or any (null)
Must be thundering (true), not thundering (false), or any (null)
Must have sky visibility (true), underground (false), or any (null)
